Preview.about: As a Full Stack Web Developer from southern Ukraine 🇺🇦 with over 4 years of industry experience, I am dedicated to creating high-quality products, constantly advancing my skills, and enjoying the simple pleasures of everyday life.

About.heading: About me
About.title: Curious about me? Here you have it:
body: My main focus is my love for creation. I always strive for quality work, and I apply this principle to all of my projects.
While working on projects, I always keep an eye on trends and the latest technologies. This helps me stay up-to-date with the latest developments in web development.
About.avocation: In addition to programming, I love reading, running, GYM training, and overall strive to lead an active and conscious lifestyle. Here is my progress in this regard:
About.summary: Finally, some quick bits about me.
About.last-thing: And finally: I respond very quickly, so don't hesitate to reach out and say hello! I promise I don't bite 😉

Skills.heading: Skills
Skills.title: The skills, tools and technologies I am really good at:

Experience.heading: My Experience
Experience.title: Here's a brief summary of my recent experience:

companies.name: NewGen
responsibilities: Optimization and caching when working with BigData databases.
Refactoring static UI components to dynamic using Livewire.
Configured a web application deployment from scratch in a Laravel Forge and Digital Ocean environment.
Set up CI/CD for a microservices architecture using Jenkins.

companies.name: FluidWeb
responsibilities: Participated in the development of an online insurance product in the USA with over 400k+ users.
Integrated tools for data collection such as SalesForce, Mixpanel, Intercom.
Built APIs for communication with American insurance companies.
Implemented cronjobs, queue mechanisms, and caching on the backend.
Participated in setting up the AWS environment for project deployment (EC2, CodeCommit, IAM, CloudWatch, S3).

companies.name: GrandySoft
responsibilities: Developed a custom UI kit for the project.
Extended existing functionality for the WEB CAD system.

PostsPreview.title: Thoughts that I really want to leave here:

GetInTouch.heading: Get In Touch
GetInTouch.title: What’s next? Feel free to reach out to me if you`re looking for a good developer, have a query, or simply want to connect.
GetInTouch.other: You may also find me on these platforms!

Posts.title: Mini blog
Posts.text: You won't find anything particularly brilliant here. I'm sharing what matters to me.
